mapper.select: select a.loan_amount,a.create_time,a.order_code,b.repayment_amount,b.create_time as payCreate_time from ged_order a,ged_order_repayment_plan b where a.order_code=b.order_no and b.repayment_flag=2 and a.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by b.create_time ASC
mapper.update:

UPDATE ged_order set sign_contract_flag=1 where contract_code=#{contractNo}
UPDATE ged_order set other_loan_amount = #{otherLoanAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_code = #{orderCode}
